ModMetaData.name: [Ry]Rimcraft Scenarios
ModMetaData.author: Ryflamer
ModMetaData.description:
Feature Overview - Lets you play as the custom world of warcraft factions. - Custom lore friendly scenarios based on the events of Azeroth. - Lore based backstories and names for each race.
Requires Humanoid Alien Framework to run. Rimcraft must be loaded after the aforementioned mod to function.
This mod is very much a work in progress. Constructive criticism, suggestions, and ideas are very much appreciated.
For more information or if you're interested in helping with the project, feel free to check out our discord if you have a personal question for me about the mod, or post pictures related to the mod. https://discord.gg/3Dp7Zug
World of Warcraft inspired content are property of Blizzard Entertainment. Go check out their awesome MMO !
Credits to: - Ryflamer - Code, and some custom scenario descriptions. - Varethyn - Majority of the custom scenario descriptions. - The alien framework and rimworld mod dev discord which helped a great deal in the creation of this mod.
